segments.text: What a typical kitchen moment, until you look closer.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The adult is facing away, wiping down her plate meticulously.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water from the faucet is gushing out uncontrollably.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's flooding the sink and spilling onto the counter.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The puddle on the floor is getting wider by the second.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's standing right in it, apron and all, unaware.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Meanwhile, the children are plotting their cookie adventure.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy climbs the stool with such excitement in his reach.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His hand is deep in the jar, pulling out goodies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl looks up eagerly, palm out for hers.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But the stool's legs are splayed, ready to give way.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Outside, the window frames a serene garden path.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's amazing how mischief hides in plain sight here.
segments.speaker: PAR
